医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的诊断设备可以在家中进行早期膀胱癌检测基于荧光的创新诊断系统利用未经处理的尿液样本进行家庭检测，以 90% 的准确率识别早期膀胱癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-diagnostic-device-could-enable-at-home-early-bladder-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/New-diagnostic-device-could-enable-at-home-early-bladder-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a92b468-5401-44f4-b8cd-bdbce2d39518 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 04:39:00 -0500 New diagnostic device could enable at-home early bladder cancer detection
FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific 将其医疗媒体业务出售给 Astorg富士胶片欧文科学公司 (FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific, Inc.) 是生命科学和医疗市场细胞培养解决方案创新和制造的全球领导者，今天宣布已达成协议，将其医疗媒体业务部门 (MBU) 出售给领先的泛医疗公司 Astorg。 -在全球医疗保健投资方面拥有广泛记录的欧洲私募股权公司。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-sells-its-medical-media-business-to-Astorg.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250123/FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-sells-its-medical-media-business-to-Astorg.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3940b17f-eddb-43f7-a5a0-652be1bd4587 Thu, 23 Jan 2025 03:58:00 -0500 FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific sells its medical media business to Astorg
研究表明创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）和焦虑与女性消防员卵巢储备功能降低有关亚利桑那大学梅尔和伊妮德祖克曼公共卫生学院的研究人员与消防合作伙伴和全国其他研究人员通过消防员癌症队列研究合作领导的一项新研究表明，创伤后应激障碍和焦虑与较低水平有关女性消防员中抗苗勒氏管激素（卵巢储备的标志物）的含量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-links-PTSD-and-anxiety-to-lower-ovarian-reserve-in-women-firefighters.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-links-PTSD-and-anxiety-to-lower-ovarian-reserve-in-women-firefighters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8597e920-a163-43f1-be1f-a7c23799cb1f Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:55:47 -0500 Study links PTSD and anxiety to lower ovarian reserve in women firefighters
新研究将肠道蛋白质与食物过敏的发生联系起来什么时候食物是营养丰富且令人愉​​悦的，什么时候会引起过敏反应？答案似乎在于生活在我们肠道中的微生物的平衡，以及肠道杯状细胞分泌的一种影响这种平衡的特定蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-study-links-intestinal- Protein-to-food-allergy-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-study-links-intestinal- Protein-to-food-allergy-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f658fa6-d352-4866-9add-fa5b528dd74f Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:50:58 -0500 New study links intestinal protein to food allergy development
研究发现英格兰儿童心理健康入院人数急剧增加伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，2012 年至 2022 年间，因心理健康问题而被送往英格兰医院普通急症病房的儿童和青少年人数增加了 65%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-finds-sharp-increase-in-mental-health-admissions-among-children-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-finds-sharp-increase-in-mental-health-admissions-among-children-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72970dbf-91c6-43ed-a7d1-7fbe06424bbb Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:42:37 -0500 Study finds sharp increase in mental health admissions among children in England
新因子 XI 抑制剂在治疗心房颤动方面显示出卓越的安全性房颤患者通常会服用抗凝剂或血液稀释剂，以降低中风的风险，但由于担心出血并发症的风险增加，许多人可能会停止服用或从未接受处方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-Factor-XI-inhibitor-shows-superior-safety-in-treating-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-Factor-XI-inhibitor-shows-superior-safety-in-treating-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e303d9ac-328b-4b1a-8cd4-be5465ba9385 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:37:24 -0500 New Factor XI inhibitor shows superior safety in treating atrial fibrillation
宾夕法尼亚大学研究人员开发了 COVID-19 疫苗接种优化框架宾夕法尼亚大学的工程和医学研究人员开发了一个突破性的框架，可以确定任何特定社区中 COVID-19 疫苗的最佳且计算最优化的分配策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Penn-researchers-develop-optimized-framework-for-COVID-19-vaccination-distribution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Penn-researchers-develop-optimized-framework-for-COVID-19-vaccination-distribution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d213635c-f338-48cc-a0ee-62661245c70a Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:31:59 -0500 Penn researchers develop optimized framework for COVID-19 vaccination distribution
新技术以高灵敏度识别血液和其他体液中的 SARS-CoV-2麻省总医院布里格姆分校的研究人员发现，一种最初设计用于癌症检测的方法也可以识别和监测急性 COVID-19 感染患者的血液和其他体液中甚至微量的 SARS-CoV-2 完整病毒颗粒，从而创造了潜在的可能性以指导患者今后的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-technique-identizes-SARS-CoV-2-in-blood-and-other-fluids-with-high-sensitivity-In.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/New-technique-identizes-SARS-CoV-2-in-blood-and-other-fluids-with-high-sensitivity-In.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a419507-e51b-4451-9e20-c248e1fad91e Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:23:00 -0500 New technique identifies SARS-CoV-2 in blood and other fluids with high sensitivity
研究揭示儿童睡眠模式的种族和民族差异密歇根州立大学人类发展和家庭研究系的研究人员发现，不同种族和族裔群体的睡眠模式可能有所不同，尤其是非白人和多种族儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-reveals-racial-and-ethnic-differences-in-childrens-sleep-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Study-reveals-racial-and-ethnic-differences-in-childrens-sleep-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bad64d9-ae4d-43f9-8c8c-3d857eed703d Wed, 22 Jan 2025 21:17:14 -0500 Study reveals racial and ethnic differences in children's sleep patterns
母亲维生素 D 缺乏可能加速胎儿衰老并影响新生儿健康怀孕期间母亲维生素 D 缺乏与婴儿出生时表观遗传胎龄加快有关，这表明维生素 D 水平低会影响胎儿发育不良。该研究还发现母亲年龄、出生身高和表观遗传衰老之间存在关联，但脐带血维生素 D 没有显示出显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Maternal-vitamin-D-deficiency-may-accelerate-fetal-aging-and-impact-newborn-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250122/Maternal-vitamin-D-deficiency-may-accelerate-fetal-aging-and-impact-newborn-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c13462bc-3826-41a2-88da-edf895230f86 Wed, 22 Jan 2025 20:48:00 -0500 Maternal vitamin D deficiency may accelerate fetal aging and impact newborn health
